alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 1:31PM MDT until June 28 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Meade County in west central South Dakota... Central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 215 PM MDT. * At 131 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Ellsworth Air Force Base, or 10 miles northeast of Rapid City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Hereford. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 57 and 68. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
